an4.216:1: "Bhikkhus, one possessing four qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there. What four? One is of wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong concentration. One possessing these four qualities is deposited in hell as if brought there.
an4.216:2: "Bhikkhus, one possessing four qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there. What four? One is of right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration. One possessing these four qualities is deposited in heaven as if brought there."
